thread.section_title: Western Bikeworks Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Western Bikeworks | westernbikeworks.com
thread.title: Tru T.
thread.title_full: Western Bikeworks reviewed by Tru T.

author: Tru T.
title: Tru T.
text:
I have been a customer of Western Bikeworks since 2011 and haven't had any issues with them. Their prices are consistently the lowest of all online vendors and shipping is fast and well packaged to prevent damage. The few times that I've had to deal with their Customer Service department (one for return and another time for credit for an item I bought that went on sales a few days later), I have always been able to talk to a real live American who was polite and helpful and resolved the issue to my satisfaction.
I will continue to shop with Western Bikeworks and have recommended them to all my cycling friends.
